title: Flamegrilled Chicken and Vegetable Salad with Mint Butter Dressing
ingredients: ['200g bulghur wheat', '600ml boiling vegetable stock, made with stock cubes', '1 aubergine, cut into 1cm slices', '2 courgettes, cut into 1cm slices', '1 large yellow pepper, thickly sliced', '3 tbsp olive oil', '3 tsp red wine vinegar', '200g pack flamegrilled chicken pieces (quartered if breast fillets)', '400g can black-eyed beans, drained and rinsed', '2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley', '25g butter', '2 tbsp chopped fresh mint, plus leaves, to garnish']
